thread.section_title: Displayit Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Displayit | displayit.com | 2 of 27
thread.title: Tribble

author: Tribble
title: Tribble
text:
Worked with Chris Buff and he was absolutely excellent in every phase from start to finish. We needed some custom needs filled in a somewhat hurried manner, but Chris and his staff met us the next day and were very accompanying. There were a couple of times where we needed to make quick changes to our order, and the Displayit staff were all over it.
Would definitely recommend to anyone looking to do any kind of trade show/staging needs.
